main.name: Vinh Tran
main.description: I am a software engineer and a web developer. With this project, I use react for my front end and Ruby on Rails for my back end

education.description: I have taken many classes in Computer Science to tried to be a good computer science programmer.
Since university has given me wide knowledge, I need a school to learn deeply.

work.title: Tutor
work.description: Tutored General Math Courses: Calculus II and below for over 50 students to assist bringing their GPA to over 3.7. Provided feedback to students using positive reinforcement techniques to encourage, motivate, and build confidence in students. Assisted in assembling lesson plans to administer to students and keep them on track with assignments. Provided private instruction to individual or small groups of students to improve academic performance.

work.title: Web Development Internshi
work.description: Worked on front-end of a Web Project using HTML, CSS and JavaScript. Learned mySQL for database management, Java and RESTful API webservices for back-end. Collaborated closely with a team of five other members, pro-actively participated in weekly team meeting and conducted report on the projectâ€™s progress. Used Git for code management and to keep tracking team progress. Assisted in maintenance of software engineering web application. Provided phone support to end-user on the team software product.

projects.title: Team Schedule using JS, react/redux and API
